channel.title: Claude Code Monitor Updates
channel.description: Most recent updates to Claude Code Monitor

item.title: Version 0.3.0-beta
item.description:
What's New in 0.3.0-beta

New Insights View

  • Period comparison cards showing week-over-week and month-over-month changes
  • Sparkline charts for daily activity trends
  • Peak activity metrics: most active hour, longest session, current streak

Pricing Provider Support

  • Configure cost calculations for Anthropic, AWS Bedrock, or Google Vertex AI
  • Pricing provider selection in Settings → General

Additional Improvements

  • Extended time range presets: Last 8 Hours, Last 2 Days
  • UI refinements for charts and period selectors

item.title: Version 0.2.1-beta
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.1-beta

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed chart interpolation: Tokens by Model now uses linear (straight lines) matching other charts
  • Removed duplicate Connected status icon from toolbar
  • Renamed Settings to Preferences in menu bar

item.title: Version 0.2.0-beta
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.0-beta

Automatic Updates via Sparkle

  • Check for Updates menu item
  • Settings → Updates tab with auto-check toggle
  • Sparkle 2.5 integration

Build Improvements

  • DMG creation with drag-to-Applications
  • Code signing via DEVELOPER_ID environment variable
  • Sparkle framework auto-bundled
